Stunned by the death of his mother, T. J. (Devin Brochu) is a 13 year old boy who lives with his father and grandmother. In this troubled time, he meets Hesher (Joseph Gordon-Levitt), a young man with a troubled past and mysterious. Hesher then assumes the position of mentor T. J., leading the boy to go through things he never imagined. Nicole (Portman) is a clerk in which, unlike Hesher, protect T. J., but the boy falls in love. Everything is complicated when Hesher moves in with the family of T. J.. So Hesher is accepted by the new family, but puts T. J. in increasing danger.
